T02D2200:88b-33: lam ma bgrod par gsal byed 'gyur //
T02D2200:88b-34: des na brjod bya'i khyad kyi nus pa yin no //
T02D2200:88b-35: 'di skad la sogs pa bshad pa mdzes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2200:88b-39: mchog gi dgos pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D2200:88b-40: brjod bya dngos po med pa'i tshig ni bstan kyang

T02D2200:88b-42: 'gyur te / drung la dkar po spyi ni 'jug gi bye brag la 'khrul pa bzhin no //
T02D2200:88b-43: des na skyon yod pa'i phyir chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams mi 'jug go //
T02D2200:88b-44: des na byis pa dang smyon pa dang mchog yin
T02D2200:88b-45: zhing gzhan la sogs pa ni dgos pa med snyam
T02D2200:88b-46: pa'am / 'di nyid kyi ma yin snyam pas mi 'jug ste /
T02D2200:88b-47: tshig dang don thams cad kyi 'brel pa dang /
T02D2200:89a-2: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa rnams gtan la phab pa sngon du byas nas mchod pas na /
T02D2200:89a-3: 'di nyid 'brel pa la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //

T02D2200:89a-5: smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du mi 'brel pa'am /

T02D2200:89a-23: pas brjod bya mtshon par byed pa'i tshig la yang
T02D2200:89a-24: brjod bya 'di'i don zhes 'brel par bya ste /
T02D2200:89a-25: 'di ltar lam la brten pas 'bras bu thob ste /
T02D2200:89a-26: de ni de dang 'gal ba'i chos spong bar 'gyur ro //

T02D2200:89a-29: 'dir sgra'i tshogs lam brten par nam yang rtogs pa

T02D2200:89b-0: dus thams @89b cad du 'bras bu 'byung ste /

T02D2200:89b-28: dgos pa'i dgos pa bstan to //

T02D2200:90a-23: no // tha dad kyang mi 'gal te bde bar gshags pa la skyon gnyis med de /

T02D2200:90a-25: dang skye mched bral bas dus thams cad bdag dang

T02D2200:90b-18: gnyis 'byung gi / de med pa'i phyir de mi

T02D2200:90b-20: de'i rang bzhin der snang ba'o //

T02D2200:90b-33: ya zhes 'byung bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis

T02D2200:102a-2: zhes pas gti mug rnam par dag ste /

T02D2200:102a-11: nyan cing sgrub pa la sogs pa /

T02D2200:102a-19: dbang bskur ba ston pa yin te /

T02D2200:102a-22: ae ma ma rungs 'jigs pa can ni klu'i gdon //

T02D2200:102a-24: ae ma yang gsang rnal 'byor che //

T02D2200:102a-26: phyogs bral khro bo khyod phyag 'tshal //

T02D2200:102a-29: rdo rje shub bur bzlas pa gsang ba'i don bye
T02D2200:102a-30: ba phrag gnyis su bzlas pas //
T02D2200:102a-31: rnal 'byor lha dang 'brel pas rnal 'bor des bzlas zhes pa'o //
T02D2200:102a-32: gong gi yon tan bstan pa ni khyod yin pas khyod la bstod //
T02D2200:102a-33: phyogs bral bi gdul bya ma lus pa dang /
T02D2200:102a-34: ye shes ma lus mnga' ba khyod la bstod //
T02D2200:102a-36: le'u bdun pa ni grangs kyi bdun pa'o //
T02D2200:102a-37: lag na rdo rje ba'i rgyud las le'u bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D2200:102a-39: // gdon bral ba dang dbang bskur ba bstan kyang /
T02D2200:102a-40: gtor ma'i las med na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir de la de bstan to //
T02D2200:102b-0: yang 'khor gyi nang nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba stan @102b las langs nas /
T02D2200:102b-1: 'di skad zhus pa'i tshig li'u kun la sbyar ro //
T02D2200:102b-2: lan gsungs pas de skad gsungs nas /
T02D2200:102b-3: 'khor thams cad dga' ba'i rjes la 'di skad gsungs so zhes pa la /
T02D2200:102b-4: de skad gsungs pa la gong gi tshig go //
T02D2200:102b-6: 'di skad gsungs ni 'og ma'i tshig rnams so //
T02D2200:102b-7: des de rnams gsungs par bstan to //
T02D2200:102b-8: thams cad ldan pa'i gtor ma la //

T02D2200:102b-12: gtsang gtor dang bgegs gtor gnyis te dang po ni ;
T02D2200:102b-13: dkar gsum mdar gsum 'bras zan dang /
T02D2200:102b-14: ldan pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya //
T02D2200:102b-16: padma dkar po sdong po'i steng du /
T02D2200:102b-17: aom sva sv'a h'a h'um dza: aom aindra ye h'um dza:/
T02D2200:102b-18: aagna ye h'um dza: ya m'a ya h'um dza:/
T02D2200:102b-19: ni rri ty'a ya h'um dza:/

T02D2200:102b-22: ku be r'a ya h'um dza:/
T02D2200:102b-23: a'i sha n'a ya h'um dza:/
T02D2200:102b-24: he ta aa dhi pa ta ye h'um dza:/
T02D2200:102b-25: s'u rya tsandr'a ya h'um dza: zhes pas spyan drangs te /
T02D2200:102b-26: gtor ma phyi rgyud bzhin phul la /

T02D2200:102b-28: aom aandi dza ma dza la dzakkha bh'u ti ba
T02D2200:102b-29: hni ya ba raksha tsanda su tsa ma ta pappa
T02D2200:102b-30: t'a ; a na t'a la atta sappa sv'a h'a
T02D2200:102b-31: ai dam ba lim bhu dza zhes pas kyang gtor
T02D2200:102b-32: ma dbul // spyan drung bar bya ste //
T02D2200:102b-33: stong gsum mi mdzad 'jig rten zhes pas spyan drungs la mchod pas mchod de /
T02D2200:102b-34: tshangs pa chen po mi mdze bdag / gzugs khams lha tshogs thams cad dang //
T02D2200:102b-35: chos bzangs lha yi 'dun sa na //
T02D2200:102b-36: rdo rje 'chang rgyal thar lam ston //
T02D2200:102b-37: brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //

T02D2200:102b-39: dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad yang bsgrags so //
T02D2200:102b-40: des mchod cing smon lam bsgrags par bya'o ;
T02D2200:102b-41: / sha chang dang ldan pa'i gtor ma la aom
T02D2200:102b-42: aa nri su tri pre du dza zhes pa lcags
T02D2200:102b-43: kyu dang bcas pas spyan drangs la /
T02D2200:102b-44: gtor ma gong bzhin yang mchod pa /
T02D2200:102b-45: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02D2200:102b-46: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po //
T02D2200:103a-2: bu smad bcas shing g-yog 'khor bcas pa rnams //
T02D2200:103a-3: gnas nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir gshegs shig / srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal ba'i gnas yan chad //
T02D2200:103a-4: rgyud drug skye 'gro ma lus thams cad kun //
T02D2200:103a-5: gnas nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir gshegs shig / ces brjod do //
T02D2200:103a-6: mchod pas mchod de dga' ba'i tshal dang zhes pa
T02D2200:103a-7: dang 'di ltar phan par byed pa la zhes brjod
T02D2200:103a-8: la / gtor ma gnyis btang ste de ni ro sreg gam rab gnas sam /
T02D2200:103a-9: dbang bskur dus su phyi mchod bgegs nye bar zhi ba'o //
T02D2200:103a-10: nang gtor ni thams cad ldan pa'i zer mas sha lnga bdud rtse lnga /
T02D2200:103a-14: kham gis bkrus te dag pa la zhes pa la /
T02D2200:103a-15: ram dmar po ka p'a la dang gsang ba'i dam rdzas sreg pa'o //
T02D2200:103a-16: bsregs pa'i thal ba yam las rlung gis gtor ba'o //
T02D2200:103a-17: bam gyi chu rgyun gyis bkrus pa'o //
T02D2200:103a-18: yam ram dbab pa'i sbyor ba bya //
T02D2200:103a-19: zhes pa la yam las rlung ram las me aa las ka p'a la /
T02D2200:103a-20: rlung gis bteg pa'am sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bos bteg pa'o //
T02D2200:103a-21: nang du aa las zla ba'i nang du bdud rtsi lnga nyi ma'i steng du sha lnga /
T02D2200:103a-22: de steng gsang sngags rgyal po 'bru gsum /
T02D2200:103a-23: rdo rje sngon po dang shes rab a'a li dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2200:103a-24: rlung bskyed me 'bar thabs shes rab zhu nas yig 'bru gsum pos sbyangs te /
T02D2200:103a-26: h'um gis bdag po 'od zer rtse la dza 'phros pas ye shes bdud rtsi dbab pa'o //
T02D2200:103a-27: aom a'a ralli ho sa ma ya dza:/
T02D2200:103a-28: zhes kyang brjod cing aom a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2200:103a-29: zhes brjod la gtor ma byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2200:103a-30: rigs drug sems can dza: zhes pas bkug la ye
T02D2200:103a-31: shes lha tshogs kyi ngo bo byin gyis brlabs la
T02D2200:103a-32: ye shes kyi lha tshogs mang po yang spyan drangs
T02D2200:103a-33: gnyis su med par bstims la bla ma yang mi
T02D2200:103a-34: bskyod par byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2200:103a-35: rang rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags la ba lim ta
T02D2200:103a-36: kh'a hi zhes lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gsum
T02D2200:103a-37: brjod la / ma ma sarba sha tr'um h'um aa
T02D2200:103a-38: mu ka ma hi ma tsa mo ta ba sam
T02D2200:103a-39: ba bu ga ru ti ram phra yam bksha ba
T02D2200:103b-0: li ai dam grihna hi kh'a hi rakka @103b pi
T02D2200:103b-1: ba to a'a:h'um kra ma sa ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2200:103b-3: aom aa k'a ros sems can thams cad la dbul /
T02D2200:103b-4: de nas bsam gtan lha mos mchod pa dbul //
T02D2200:103b-5: h'um gi 'od zer rtse la lha mo mang po byung nas mchod ces pa'o //
T02D2200:103b-6: gtsang gtor ni gong dang mthun pas 'di ru yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2200:103b-7: des na dbang bsur ba'i tva nhra las /
T02D2200:103b-8: gtor ma'i las rnams kun la yang //
T02D2200:103b-9: sngon byas med cing go rims bral /
T02D2200:103b-10: rdzas tshogs dang bsam gtan bral //
T02D2200:103b-14: phyi nang gi gtor ma ngi rdzes ma 'dres par
T02D2200:103b-15: so sor tshang pa la byin gyis brlabs te bsngo
T02D2200:103b-16: zhing smon lam btab la sa btsang sar bskyal zhes
T02D2200:103b-17: pa'o // da ni khro bo gos sngon can zhes pas dam tshig bsgrag pa ste dngos su bas /
T02D2200:103b-18: aa k'a ro mu kham yang kun la sbyin pa ste /
T02D2200:103b-20: le'u brgyad pa ni grangs kyi brgyad pa'o //
T02D2200:103b-21: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las phyi nang
T02D2200:103b-22: gi gtor ma rgya cher bshad ste le'u brgyad pa'o
T02D2200:103b-24: // // des phyi nang gi gtor ma btang yang sngags ma
T02D2200:103b-25: bstan na de la mos pa rnams kyis mi 'grub
T02D2200:103b-27: de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02D2200:103b-28: gdul ka 'dul ba'i bdag po des //
T02D2200:103b-29: zhes pa la de nas le'u brgyad pa song ba'i rting nge nas /
T02D2200:103b-30: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpal gnyis te lha mo'o //
T02D2200:103b-31: gdul dka' ni gong du bstan to //
T02D2200:103b-32: bdag po ni sbrul sku badzra p'a ni /
T02D2200:103b-33: bsam gtan 'khor lo med pa la //
T02D2200:103b-34: sngags kyi nges pa bshad par bya //
T02D2200:103b-36: bsam gtan ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong med pa la ste /
T02D2200:103b-37: rnal 'byor de la mi mos pa'o //
T02D2200:103b-38: sngags kyi nge pa ni dbye ba bshad pa'o //
T02D2200:103b-39: de la tadya th'a nas ba pi shuddhi zhes pa'i yig 'bru so gcig pas /
T02D2200:103b-41: tadya th'a buddha zhes pa nas /
T02D2200:103b-42: n'ag tra ta sa ta na ya phat ces pas
T02D2200:103b-43: klu gzir ba'i sme bral gyi dus sam man na
T02D2200:103b-45: n'i l'am ba sa na ya phat ces pa nas /
T02D2200:103b-46: kun shan ma dod sa ha ya phat ces pas /
T02D2200:103b-47: gshin rje'i don bzlog pa dang nor bsgrub pa dang sgo lcags dbye ba dang /
T02D2200:104a-2: pre ta zhes pa yi dgas dang sha za bzlog par bstan to //
T02D2200:104a-3: yaksha zhes pas gnod sbyin bzlog par shes par bya'o //
T02D2200:104a-4: ha sa nas big sha ka ra ya phat phat kyis 'byung po spyir gsad pa ste /
T02D2200:104a-5: kun la sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2200:104a-6: sarba sha tr'um ni dge 'dun gyi dgra 'dul ba ste /
T02D2200:104a-7: 'brub khud gru gsum pa ru gseg shang gi rtse gnyis pas brdungs te /
T02D2200:104a-8: sngags kyang stod smad dang yang na gsum /
T02D2200:104a-9: n'i l'am bar dang sang ha ni yab yum gyi sngags so //
T02D2200:104a-10: de la bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa la sbyar ro //
T02D2200:104a-11: gtubs te bzlas pa dang mi gtub pa dang /
T02D2200:104a-12: bde bar gshegs pa ma gsungs te /
T02D2200:104a-13: gang la bya ba de grub ces gsungs so //
T02D2200:104a-14: yang sngags rings kho na la ao tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02D2200:104a-15: ces rtags ni klu gdon du gyur pa la bzlas par shes par bya'o //
T02D2200:104a-16: rdo rje be con nas khyod phyag 'tshal gyis bstod pa bstan te /
T02D2200:104a-18: le'u dgu pa ni grangs kyi dgu pa'o //
T02D2200:104a-19: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud rgya cher bshad pa las le'u dgu pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02D2200:104a-21: // klu ma khugs na gsad pa'i las mi 'grub pas dgug pa bstan to //
T02D2200:104a-22: de nas klu dgug pa'i sngags bstan to //
T02D2200:104a-23: rdo rje lcags kyu rlung gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2200:104a-24: de bzhin me yin kyang ni 'dul bar nus pa yin //
T02D2200:104a-26: de nas ni le'u dgu pa song ba'i rting de
T02D2200:104a-27: nas bar tshig kyang mchod par klu ni klu ring
T02D2200:104a-28: ba'o // rdo rje'i ring nge 'dzin dang ldan pas /
T02D2200:104a-29: lag na rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags 'og ma zlos shing /
T02D2200:104a-30: 'og tu rlung lha rda mos bteg ste 'gugs pa'o //
T02D2200:104a-31: de bzhin me yis kyang 'dul bar nus pa yin de ltar nus phyir //
T02D2200:104a-32: dgug pa'i sngags 'di bstan par bya //
T02D2200:104a-34: mi yis kyang 'dul zhes pa la /
T02D2200:104a-35: gnod pa'i gnas su me'i sngags dang 'brel pas sreg ste /
T02D2200:104a-36: de nas dgug par shes par bya'o //
T02D2200:104a-37: sngags ni che ge mo zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2200:104a-39: bsam gtan drag pos bzlas par bya //
T02D2200:104a-42: bsam gtan drag po ni khro bo'i cha byad can te /
T02D2200:104b-1: bzlas pa gri hna zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D2200:104b-2: khro bo lcags kyu thogs pa mang pos khrid nas 'ongs par gsungs so //
T02D2200:104b-3: klu rigs du ma thams cad kun //
T02D2200:104b-6: klu rigs du ma ni klu rigs bzhi'i klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag kyang yongs su gsung ngo //
T02D2200:104b-7: ting nge 'dzin dang sngags gong du bstan pa 'di
T02D2200:104b-8: ma yin pa gzhan gyis khug ba ma yin par
T02D2200:104b-9: bstan to // ji srid khug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis /
T02D2200:104b-10: khugs par gyur pa'i klu rnams kun //
T02D2200:104b-12: 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni gong du gsungs pa'o //
T02D2200:104b-13: khugs par gyur pa ni gnas nas 'ongs pa'o //
T02D2200:104b-14: de la dam la ma btags pa'i klu la /
T02D2200:104b-15: skyer pa'i bam po dang sbyin sred par 'brel te /
T02D2200:104b-16: thab skud pa la sogs bla ma'i gdams dag la rag lus par bya'o //
T02D2200:104b-17: zangs zhod nang du spyan drangs te /
T02D2200:104b-18: zhes pa zangs gzhong du klu ba su dha ris
T02D2200:104b-19: drug gi gzugs bag zan las byas la klu sman
T02D2200:104b-21: nyen pas zin pa'i gzugs la sbal pa la sogs pa bkod la /
T02D2200:104b-22: lcags kyi skam pa ka ya tsas //
T02D2200:104b-23: shing dag sor ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02D2200:104b-24: yongs su bcad par bya ba yin //
T02D2200:104b-26: smyag shad kyi lcug ma sor bcu gnyis pa /
T02D2200:104b-27: byis pa lo brgyad lon pas brngas te /
T02D2200:104b-28: rma bya'i mdongs dang tshon skud kyis bcings la /
T02D2200:104b-29: nyen pa rnams la byabs te /
T02D2200:104b-30: sbal pa yang mandala steng du phab la /
T02D2200:104b-31: nyen dang ldan pa lhar bsgoms te bsrung ba bya zhes pa drang 'brel te /
T02D2200:104b-32: de nas dam tshig bsre ba dang /
T02D2200:104b-33: sman gyi mchog gis tshigs bcad dang bcas pas gso ste /
T02D2200:104b-34: khro bo'i che ba brjod cing gnod pa ma byed par bsgo la /
T02D2200:104b-35: gang gnod pa'i sar bskyal zhes bya'o //
T02D2200:104b-36: le'u bcu pa ni grangs kyi bcu pa'o //
T02D2200:104b-37: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud rgya cher bshad pa'i 'grel pa las le'u bcu pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02D2200:104b-39: // dgug pa bstan kyang drag po kho na'i las ma
T02D2200:104b-40: bstan na tshar chod bar mi 'gyur bas drag po'i
T02D2200:104b-41: las bstan to // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste /
T02D2200:104b-42: zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul ba'i //
T02D2200:105a-1: gzir drag sngags bstan par bya //
T02D2200:105a-3: de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni khugs pa'i rting
T02D2200:105a-4: la gzhan klu gnyan sa bdag zhi bas mi nyan
T02D2200:105a-5: pa la / klu gzir ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02D2200:105a-6: dam la ma thogs pa la dang por zhi bas byas la de nas drag pos gdul zhes pa'o //
T02D2200:105a-7: aom badzra p'a ni zhes pa nas /
T02D2200:105a-8: h'um phat kyi bar gyi sngags gsungs so //
T02D2200:105a-9: de yang bdag gi ming dang 'brel pa las khro
T02D2200:105a-10: bo rnams kyis klu la rgyob mtshon cha rgyob ces
T02D2200:105a-11: pa'o // da ha ni sregs ro sregs zhes pa'o //
T02D2200:105a-13: stobs khro bo rnams kyis non zhes pa dang shin tu non rnam par tshogs /
T02D2200:105a-15: 'gul mi nus par rgyob rgyob ces bya'o //
T02D2200:105a-16: bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yis //
T02D2200:105a-17: gdul bya'i steng nas dbab par bya //
T02D2200:105a-20: bsam gtan ni rang rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o //
T02D2200:105a-21: khro bo rnams kyi sprul pa /
T02D2200:105a-22: rdo rje dang tho ba thogs pa'o //
T02D2200:105a-23: gdul bya ni steng nas khro bo rnams kyis char 'bebs pa'o //
T02D2200:105a-26: gru gsum gdengs par dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'dra bar /
T02D2200:105a-28: bsgrub bya'i lte ba nas kyang me 'bar te bsreg pa'o //
T02D2200:105a-29: me dpung chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2200:105a-30: me 'bar klong chen dkyil du gzir //
T02D2200:105a-32: me dpung ni dus mtha'i me bas che bas sreg par 'gyur /
T02D2200:105a-33: gzir ba ni khro bo dang mtshon cha dang 'od zer ro //

T02D2200:108b-34: phra ba ni a'a li dang ldan pa'i rtsa la rlung bus te /
T02D2200:108b-35: thig le las me 'bar te bde ba /
T02D2200:108b-37: mchog tu bde ba bskyed pa ni phra ba'o //
T02D2200:108b-38: ting nge 'dzin de la ming de yod pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2200:108b-39: ci snang dngos po ni kun du rtog pa thams
T02D2200:108b-40: cad 'bar ba stong ba nyid du zhu zhes pa'o
T02D2200:108b-41: // de nyid mtha' 'das ni lam chos kyi phyag
T02D2200:108b-42: rgya 'od gsal nyams su blangs pas de ni lam
T02D2200:108b-44: rang bzhin med ni 'bras bu chos kyi sku thob pa'o //
T02D2200:108b-46: bral bas rang bzhin med ces bya'o //
T02D2200:108b-48: sbrul pa bde chen longs spyod chos //
T02D2200:108b-49: rlung dang me la rab gnas pas //
T02D2200:108b-50: mtha' 'das rang bzhin chos sku thob //
T02D2200:109a-2: / de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02D2200:109a-3: bla med rdzogs pa'i klong chen du //
T02D2200:109a-6: sems can chags pa can drangs pa'i phyir //
T02D2200:109a-7: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa bstan te /
T02D2200:109a-8: ri rab kyi rtse la dpal ldan gos sngon can
T02D2200:109a-9: ni khro mo rdo rje sreg ma dang snyoms par
T02D2200:109a-11: sangs rgyas gos sngon can ni rdo rje gsang ba mo dang snyoms par zhugs so //
T02D2200:109a-12: rin po che'i mtshan gos sngon can ni rdo rje zhi ba mo dang snyoms par zhugs so //
T02D2200:109a-13: padma gos sngon can ni khro mo dag byed ma dang snyoms par zhugs so //
T02D2200:109a-14: las kyi gos sngon can ni rdo rje rgyal ba mo dang snyoms par zhugs so //
T02D2200:109a-15: de dga' ba bzhi rnam par dag pa skye ba'i tshul bstan te /
T02D2200:109a-16: de ni 'dod pa la zhen pa rnams rab tu 'joms pa'o //
T02D2200:109a-17: lung las rdo rje khro bo rnams dang sbyor //
T02D2200:109a-20: dga' bzhi'i tshul dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2200:109a-21: des kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2200:109a-23: 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po kun //
T02D2200:109a-24: gnas dang dus dang rgyal ba las //
T02D2200:109a-26: 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po chags pa dang bral ba'i rigs so //
T02D2200:109a-27: de lta bu'i spyod pas sangs rgyas mthong bas 'di
T02D2200:109a-28: ni tha mal pa spyod pa'i 'khor ba'i lam zhes
T02D2200:109a-30: dus thob pa'i thabs med do zhes zer nas brgyal ba'o //
T02D2200:109a-31: bslang ste bla med don bstan pas //
T02D2200:109a-32: thams cad 'dod chags mngon sangs rgyas //
T02D2200:109a-34: bam sam sa ma ya ho //
T02D2200:109a-35: zhes brjod nas brgyal ba kun bslangs /
T02D2200:109a-36: bla na med pa pho nya'i lam dga' ba bzhi
T02D2200:109a-37: dngos po lam stong pa nyid bzhi lam la btsud
T02D2200:109a-38: pas chags pa dang bral ba'i gnod sbyin kun pho
T02D2200:109a-39: nya'i lam las sangs rgya shing 'bras bu thob bo
T02D2200:109a-40: // des na 'dod chags mngon sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
T02D2200:109a-41: 'khor gyis sku la bstod pa ni //
T02D2200:109a-42: 'khor lhag ma rnams yi rangs te /
T02D2200:109a-43: bstod pa gsungs pa kye ho zhes gtso bo ye shes la bstod do //
T02D2200:109a-44: de nas bstod pa bzhi ngo bos rtogs pa thams cad 'dag pa ste /
T02D2200:109a-45: bstod pa gcig ni rtsa ba nags la bas ma bris so //
T02D2200:109b-0: snyoms @109b bar 'jug pa nas thabs dang shes rab
T02D2200:109b-1: zung du 'brel ba'i mngon shes sel ba'i 'dod chags
T02D2200:109b-2: ni / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i lam //
T02D2200:109b-3: bstod ba'i gnas su 'di gsungs so //
T02D2200:109b-5: le'u bcu bzhi ba ni grangs kyi bcu bzhi ba'o //
T02D2200:109b-6: lag na rdo rje rtse ba'i rgyud rgya cher bshad pa las le'u bcu bzhi ba'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2200:109b-9: // / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams zhes pa nas 'khor
T02D2200:109b-10: gyis gtso bo la bstod pa nas bla med skyabs
T02D2200:109b-12: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pas gtso bo la bstod pa bstan te /
T02D2200:109b-13: nyams su blang ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2200:109b-14: gtso bo la mos pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2200:109b-15: tshig don yin pas rgyud dngos su bstan pas bshad pa ni ma byas so //
T02D2200:109b-16: yi rang ba ni ston pa'i chos gsum du bstan pa la mos pas yi rang ba ste /
T02D2200:109b-17: lha dang klu dang lha ma yin la sogs pa
T02D2200:109b-18: yang yid dga' ba'i mchod pas khyab par gyur to
T02D2200:109b-22: glu ni dga' bo la sogs pa'o //
T02D2200:109b-23: lha ma yin ni thags bzangs la sogs pa'o //
T02D2200:109b-24: mi'am ci ni rta mgo can dang /
T02D2200:109b-28: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams byang chub sems dang ldan zhing /
T02D2200:109b-29: stong pa nyid kyi don zab mo la mos pa'o//
T02D2200:109b-30: mi la sogs pa thams cad 'jig pa'i rten dang
T02D2200:109b-31: ldan pa thams cad de ba la bkod do zhes
T02D2200:109b-32: bya ba la / ri rab kyi rtse la rgyud 'di bshad pas /
T02D2200:109b-34: mi dang lha dang klu dang lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams nad las grol bar gyur to //
T02D2200:109b-35: bde gshegs zhal nas gsungs pa'i rgyud rnams la //
T02D2200:109b-36: bshad cing man ngag 'grel par byas pa rnams //
T02D2200:109b-37: kun la don dang ngag gi skyon rnams yod pa ste //
T02D2200:109b-38: bzang por sems kyang skyon te de ni rang gi khengs pa'i sems //
T02D2200:109b-39: dper na 'dam gyi sengge sengge yin zhes nya rnams smra /
T02D2200:109b-41: des na 'dir ni rgyud kyi dgongs pa la /
T02D2200:109b-42: skyes dang lhag pa'i mthong las tshogs pa gsum du 'dus /
T02D2200:109b-43: bskyed pa'i rgyas pa bsdus dang shin tu bsdus par gsungs //
T02D2200:109b-46: rim gyis bskyed dang cig car gyis //
T02D2200:109b-47: gang zag blo yis rim par gsungs//
T02D2200:110a-0: @110a * // rdzogs pa gnyis su bstan pa yang //
T02D2200:110a-1: mtshan bcas dang ni mtshan med do //
T02D2200:110a-2: mtshan bcas kun brtags lam du byed //
T02D2200:110a-3: rtsa rlung byang chub sems kyis su //
T02D2200:110a-4: rim gyis ye shes skye bar 'dod //
T02D2200:110a-5: mtshan med nyams su skye lugs kyang //
T02D2200:110a-6: mi rtog stong pa nyams su blang //
T02D2200:110a-7: stong pas stong pa goms par byed //
T02D2200:110a-8: skad cig goms sogs spangs pa yis //
T02D2200:110a-9: lam lnga dang ni lam gnyis bgrod //
T02D2200:110a-11: dri bcas dang ni dri ma med //
T02D2200:110a-12: 'di ni thar pa'i lam la gnas //
T02D2200:110a-13: dri bcas dpe yi ye shes tshol //
T02D2200:110a-14: drod dang rtse mo chos mchog rnams /
T02D2200:110a-15: ma rtogs mthong lam skye ba med //
T02D2200:110a-16: mthong lam skad cig bcu drug gis //
T02D2200:110a-17: mthong spangs nyon mongs spong bar byed //
T02D2200:110a-18: gnyen po ye shes bcu drug go //
T02D2200:110a-19: nyi ma grib ma tshul du spong //
T02D2200:110a-20: chos ni snang bar gsal ba'o //
T02D2200:110a-21: skad cig phyi ma snang ba mched //
T02D2200:110a-22: mthong lam ye shes ma mthong mthong //
T02D2200:110a-23: snang ba stong par thob pa'o //
T02D2200:110a-24: drod rtse la sogs gnyis kyi rten //
T02D2200:110a-25: nges par byed pa'i cha brgyad pos //
T02D2200:110a-26: sgom pa spong ba'i nyon mongs spong //
T02D2200:110a-27: 'di ni drod spang bsgom pa'i lam //
T02D2200:110a-28: rgyu yi theg par rab bstan pa'i ;
T02D2200:110a-29: / lam lnga rim gyis bgrod mi dgos //
T02D2200:110a-30: 'di ru lam lnga gsungs pa yang //
T02D2200:110a-31: ye shes skye ba'i bgrod tshul lo //
T02D2200:110a-32: grogs ni tshogs kyi gtor ma dang //
T02D2200:110a-34: zhi gnas lhag mthong skye ba'i rgyu //
T02D2200:110a-35: rgyu la ma brten 'bras pu med //
T02D2200:110a-36: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
T02D2200:110a-38: de ni mi rigs smra ba ste //
T02D2200:110a-39: ri bong rva sogs tshang 'jal bzhin //
T02D2200:110a-40: legs par bstan kyang don med 'gyur //
T02D2200:110a-43: rgyu las 'bras bu dngos yod na//
T02D2200:110a-45: gal te rgyu yis 'bras bskyed na /
T02D2200:110a-46: 'bras bu dus su rgyu med pas //
T02D2200:110a-47: rgyu 'bras lhan cig mi gnas pas //
T02D2200:110a-48: phan tshun spangs pa mi gnas 'gyur //
T02D2200:110a-50: rgyu yang mthong lam ye shes te //
T02D2200:110b-1: stong nyid bde ba'i ye shes dang //
T02D2200:110b-2: skad cig goms sogs nyams blangs pas //
T02D2200:110b-3: rgyu 'bras gnyis med bgrod pa ni //
T02D2200:110b-4: 'bras bu gsang sngags thob lugs so //
T02D2200:110b-5: skad cig goms pa rgyu yin te //
T02D2200:110b-6: goms pa mthar sngon rtogs pa'o //
T02D2200:110b-7: rgyu las rten byung shugs kyis rtogs //
T02D2200:110b-9: kho bo gzhung gis de skad smras //
T02D2200:110b-11: bden pa gnyis su rab bstan pa //
T02D2200:110b-12: blo yi rtogs tshul bye brag go //
T02D2200:110b-13: gnyis bral yang dag rtogs tshul ni //
T02D2200:110b-14: bla med don la gnas zhes gsungs//
T02D2200:110b-15: des ni rgyud kyi sdom tshig ni //
T02D2200:110b-16: gnyis dang gsum du dus par gsungs //
T02D2200:110b-17: bdag 'dra dman pa'i gang zag gis //
T02D2200:110b-18: sa ma non cing yid ma zhal ma mthong //
T02D2200:110b-19: yang sprul mkha' 'gro rnams dang bde gshegs lam //
T02D2200:110b-20: rang nyid gos sngon can la mos pa yis //
T02D2200:110b-21: rang la brten dang thar pa'i lam //
T02D2200:110b-22: rang bas blo zhan rnams la phan par bya phyir dang //
T02D2200:110b-23: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2200:110b-24: dgongs pa mchad bya phyir dang //
T02D2200:110b-25: snying rje gnyis med sogs kyi mtshams //
T02D2200:110b-26: man ngag tshig don rgyas par bstan //
T02D2200:110b-27: tshig la nyes pa med de snga ma snga dang gsang sngags dag tu sbyar //
T02D2200:110b-28: de gzhan med de 'di la dga' ba skyes //
T02D2200:110b-29: gal te bdag gis khro tshig dang //
T02D2200:110b-30: don la nyes pa shor srid na //
T02D2200:110b-31: dus gsum rigs lnga'i bde bag gshegs pa dang //
T02D2200:110b-32: mkha' shing shes pa rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02D2200:110b-33: dad pa tshe la gyong khengs med//
T02D2200:110b-34: sgang bu dma' la 'gro don rtsom //
T02D2200:110b-35: snying rje shes rab che rtsom zhing //
T02D2200:110b-36: gsang sngags chos dang bla ma la ni gus //
T02D2200:110b-37: dbang bskur thob cing dam tshig ldan sogs pa //
T02D2200:110b-38: de la gong ma'i man ngag rgyun ma chad par sbyin //
T02D2200:110b-39: de ma byin na gsang sngags dam tshig nyams //
T02D2200:110b-41: rdzogs ldan dus kyi tha ma la //
T02D2200:110b-42: rtsa ba dang chad snying rje bral /
T02D2200:110b-43: khva ltar bu cor smra zhing gsang sngags phrag khyer ba //
T02D2200:110b-44: de la sogs pa gang zag rnams la nor la bltas te byin //
T02D2200:110b-45: 'phen byed las kyis 'phangs na rdo rje dmyal bar skye //
T02D2200:111a-0: rdzogs byed las kyis dan song @111a * //
T02D2200:111a-3: mnar med dan song du skye 'bras bu tsha grang sdug bsngal myong //
T02D2200:111a-4: thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel ba'i //
T02D2200:111a-5: nyi zla lta bu'i dam chos 'di //
T02D2200:111a-6: bden pa gnyis dang mi 'gal gsang sngags 'bras bu'i lam //
T02D2200:111a-7: chos 'di legs par bris pas khams gsum sems can rnams //
T02D2200:111a-8: drod dang rtse mo bzod pa'i chos kyi rtse //
T02D2200:111a-9: ye shes bzhi yi tshul gyis nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi //
T02D2200:111a-10: mthong sgom sgrib pa rnams dang bral ba dang //
T02D2200:111a-11: sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad dang yongs bral ba'i //
T02D2200:111a-12: mdze 'bras nad dang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sogs //
T02D2200:111a-13: sdug bsngal rab zhi myur du bde bar shog / bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams //
T02D2200:111a-14: sdug bsngal ma lus rab zhi nas //
T02D2200:111a-15: gos sngon dngos grub thob par shog /'phags pa gos

T02D2200:111a-19: sngags kyi theg pa'i bstan bcos 'di //
